TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDuplexSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public Interface IDuplexSessionChannel Implements IDuplexChannel, ISessionChannel(Of IDuplexSession)

type IDuplexSessionChannel = interface interface IDuplexChannel interface IInputChannel interface IOutputChannel interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject interface ISessionChannel<IDuplexSession>

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that associates a duplex channel with a session.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
[!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-interface-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-interface-note.md)]
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel> interface indicates that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexChannel> implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession> semantics.
Given an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>, its associated <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSession> can be retrieved through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property.
